ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1174
ygData.msgSnippet: Jeeeps talk about paranoia. Those are all understandable arguments. In my example I stated specifically, the home of the halflings. You may not know your way
ygData.messageBody:
Jeeeps talk about paranoia.
Those are all understandable arguments. In my example
I stated specifically, the home of the halflings.

You may not know your way around but I bet you all
know the starting zones of the races? Home of the
halflings, just happened to be the Fastest way to any
bank pre-planes of power. Circle of Misty was the
most used spell in the game prior to that.

But we all have seen the BOUGHT toon regardless.

Enjoy all, and get out and see the world :)

<Remembers 1st time ever running through West
Karana..>



--- johndg072465@... wrote:

> I have to agree with Durgaa, I have a level 70
> beastlord and havent been
> everywhere yet. And btw, I worked my BL from the
> ground up. There are places I
> havent, and have no desire to ever go to.
>
> Cayliss
>
> 70 BST
>
